00020 namespace std {
00021 
00023 inline std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& os,
00024                                  const std::vector<double>& vec)
00025 {
00026    std::vector<double>::const_iterator it = vec.begin();
00027    int i = 0;
00028    os << "<";
00029    while (it != vec.end()) {
00030       if (it != vec.begin()) {
00031          os << ",";
00032       }
00033       os << *it;
00034       //os << std::setw(4) << i << std::setw(8) << *it << std::endl;
00035       it++;
00036       i++;
00037    }
00038    os << ">";
00039    return os;
00040 }
00041 
00042 }
